transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello.
Speaker B: Yes. Sorry.
Speaker A: Hello. Yeah, I'm calling from Amber Student. This is regarding your recommendation. Aditya.
Speaker B: Okay. Hi.
Speaker A: Yeah, hi. We actually got an information that you are looking to book this accommodation called IQ the Arcade.
Speaker B: IQ Arcade? Yes. Actually that like. I'll go ahead with my uni accommodation only.
Speaker A: Okay. So you got an update. You. We had a word yesterday that you are waiting for university. So have you got the confirmation?
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: All right. No worries. Thank you so much for the confirmation. In case in future need any help. Feel free to message me.
Speaker B: Okay? Okay.
